product_name: The North Face Terra 40 Pack - Women's
long_description: A versatile, midsized outdoor do-it-all, The North Face Terra 40 Pack for women offers an updated, super-comfortable suspension system and enough volume for multiple days out. Padded shoulder harness is sleek and anatomical; improved, anatomically correct hipbelt spreads the load and is lined with soft air mesh. Vertical channel on the back panel provides improved ventilation. The North Face Terra 40 Pack features improved zippered sleeping bag compartment access and 7+ pockets.
short_description: A versatile, midsized outdoor do-it-all, The North Face Terra 40 Pack for women offers an updated, super-comfortable suspension system and enough volume for multiple days out.
